items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty signals higher open for India markets; Asia markets mixed
items.description: Stock Market Today: Markets in India were likely to open with a slight upside on Monday, indicated GIFT Nifty futures, which were trading around 50 points ahead of Nifty futures last close.

items.description: Derivatives market update Oct 14: The Nifty weekly options data shows a tug-of-war between the bulls and the bears at the 25,000 Strike Price. FIIs continue to hold notable shorts in Bank Nifty.

items.title: Wipro gains 3% as board to mull bonus issue in a meeting on Oct 16-17
items.description: Wipro bonus issue: Wipro bonus issue: The board will consider bonus issue in a board meeting from October 16 to October 17

items.title: DMart share price plunges 9% as Q2 miss street estimates, brokerages mixed
items.description: The fall in DMart share price came after the company's September quarter results missed street expectations.

items.title: Ashoka Buildcon stock flies 8% after Co receives LoA worth Rs 3,982 cr
items.description: Shares of civil construction firm Ashoka Buildcon rose as much 8 per cent at Rs 272 per share on the BSE in Monday's intraday trade

items.title: Ipca Labs share price hits new high; Motilal Oswal upgrades stock to 'buy'
items.description: Ipca Labs news today: In the past one week, the stock of the pharmaceutical company has rallied 14 per cent as compared to 0.16 per cent decline in the BSE Sensex

items.title: Indian bond yields dip as RBI cuts debt sale, govt announces second buyback
items.description: The benchmark bond yield may drop to 6.30 per cent by March end, on strong foreign inflows and rate cuts from the central bank

items.title: Redtape hits record high; stock zooms 49% in 2 months on positive outlook
items.description: Stock market today: CRISIL expects revenue to grow further with strong domestic demand from metro cities and increasing penetration in tier II cities over the medium term.

items.title: Premier Energies share skyrockets 10% after arms secure orders of Rs 765 cr
items.description: The surge in Premier Energies share price came after the company announced that it has secured orders worth Rs 765 crore.

items.title: Gensol Engineering gains over 3% on bagging order of Rs 186 crore; details
items.description: The rise in Gensol Engineering share price came after the company announced that it has secured a contract win of 23MWp for a rooftop solar project in Dubai worth Rs 186 crore.

items.title: Rekha Jhunjhunwala portfolio stock up 99% from June low; zooms 270% in 1 yr

items.title: Bajaj Auto Q2FY25 preview: Revenue may climb upto 25% YoY on strong volumes
items.description: Analysts are optimistic about major revenue growth for Bajaj Auto, driven by robust volume increases and effective pricing strategies.

items.title: Ola Electric share price slips 3% as ARAI questions co's pricing practices
items.description: Ola Electric share price declined as Automotive Research Association of India asked the company to provide clarification about a price reduction for its S1 X 2 kWh model in its recently announced sale
